mapper.select: SELECT t.video_id, t.like_num, t.goods_id, t.user_id, t.create_date, t.shop_id, t.username, t.userimgurl, t.shop_name, t.address, IFNULL((tvur.user_id),0)AS isUpvote FROM (SELECT tvu.video_id, tv.like_num, tvu.goods_id, tvu.user_id, tv.upload_time AS create_date, tvu.shop_id, tui.NAME AS username, tui.avatar_id AS userimgurl, tsp.`shop_name`, tsp.address FROM t_video_user tvu ,t_user_info tui , t_shop tsp , t_video tv WHERE tvu.user_id = tui.user_id AND tsp.u_id = tvu.shop_id AND tv.u_id = tvu.video_id AND tv.u_id = #{0}) t LEFT JOIN t_video_upvote_record tvur ON tvur.video_id=t.video_id AND tvur.user_id=#{1}

SELECT sr.u_id , sr.path , sr.md5 , sr.type FROM s_resources sr INNER JOIN ( SELECT tmr.data_id FROM t_metadata_rel tmr WHERE tmr.type = 1 AND tmr.record_id IN ( SELECT tv.video_url FROM t_video_user tvu , t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id = tv.u_id AND user_id = #{userId})) t ON t.data_id = sr.u_id

SELECT sr.u_id, sr.path, sr.md5 FROM s_resources sr INNER JOIN (SELECT tmr.data_id FROM t_metadata_rel tmr WHERE tmr.type = 1 AND tmr.record_id IN (SELECT tv.video_url FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id = tv.u_id AND tvu.user_id = #{userId})) t ON t.data_id = sr.u_id LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT t4.goods_id, t4.shop_name, t4.videourl, t5.videoimglist FROM (SELECT t1.u_id,tvu.goods_id, ts.shop_name , sr.md5 AS videourl FROM (SELECT tv.u_id, tv.video_url FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tv.`status`=3 AND tvu.user_id=#{userId}) t1 LEFT JOIN t_video_user tvu ON tvu.video_id=t1.u_id LEFT JOIN t_shop ts ON tvu.shop_id = ts.u_id LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON t1.video_url= tmr.record_id AND tmr.type=1 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id= sr.u_id) t4,
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t3.md5) AS videoimglist, t3.record_id FROM (SELECT sr.md5 , tmr.record_id, t2.u_id AS t3videoid FROM (SELECT tv.u_id, tv.video_url FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tv.`status`=3 AND tvu.user_id=#{userId}) t2 LEFT JOIN t_video_user tvu ON tvu.video_id=t2.u_id LEFT JOIN t_shop ts ON tvu.shop_id = ts.u_id LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON t2.video_url= tmr.record_id AND tmr.data_type=4 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id= sr.u_id) t3 GROUP BY t3.record_id) t5 WHERE t4.u_id=t5.record_id

SELECT sr.path, sr.md5 FROM t_video_user tvu, t_metadata_rel tmr, s_resources sr, t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tv.video_url= tmr.record_id AND tmr.data_id= sr.u_id AND tmr.type = 1 AND tvu.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sr.path, sr.md5, sr.u_id,tmr.type ,tmr.data_id FROM t_metadata_rel tmr, s_resources sr WHERE sr.u_id=tmr.data_id AND tmr.data_id IN (SELECT data_id FROM t_metadata_rel WHERE record_id IN (SELECT tv.video_url FROM t_video tv WHERE tv.u_id =#{videoId} ))
SELECT t2.* FROM t_metadata_rel t1 LEFT JOIN s_resources t2 ON t1.data_id = t2.u_id WHERE t1.record_id = #{recordId} LIMIT 1
SELECT t2.* FROM t_metadata_rel t1 LEFT JOIN s_resources t2 ON t1.data_id = t2.u_id WHERE t1.record_id = #{recordId}
